prompt: What is something that excited you today?
What has drained your energy today?
What did you learn about yourself today?
Write down three great things that happened today.
What are things that you are grateful for?
What terrible things did not happen to you today?
Start with »I remember…« and explore one of your memories.

Start writing.
Write anything that comes to your mind.
Draw if you want.
Do not stop.
Do not start editing.
Keep your hands moving.
